name: Somewhere Beyond The Stars
description:
An ordinary teenager leads an ordinary life, unexcited by but ultimately content with his mundane day-to-day activities. One day, he and his friend - an equally ordinary teenager - find themselves in a mystical world after a party gone wrong. They are led by a strange girl to an even stranger school, where they come to realize that maybe, they don’t need to go home.

Made by a bunch of high school kids for a school project. Credits and special thanks can be found in-game.

Please report game bugs either in the comments or send an e-mail to howard2004@live.ca. Thanks for checking this game out!
